document.query: CREATE TABLE `serial_number` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `purchase_order_id` bigint(20), `product_id` bigint(20), `serial_number` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `created_at` datetime, `updated_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
